settings.content: Theme settings allow designers to provide an easy way for any user to customize the look and feel of their shop without having to delve into HTML or CSS code. Please see our [help page on theme settings](http://docs.shopify.com/themes/theme-templates/settings) to learn more about how you can make your theme customizable.

settings.label: Enable Shopify Payments?
settings.info: * Only avaiable for store has Shopify Payments. Link [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/payments/shopify-payments/multi-currency/setup)

settings.label: Enable Automatic currency?
settings.info: Don't choose all 3 options at the same time or combine Shopify payment with others. Link [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/payments/shopify-payments/multi-currency/setup)

settings.content: Separate your currency codes with a space. Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code. Click [here](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php) for a complete list of currency codes. Example: CAD USD.

* For this functionality to work in your shop, you are required to edit your money formats as per [these instructions](http://help.shopify.com/en/themes/customization/currencies) (“Do tell where the money is”).
